data.text: @itsyourxyz Can you imagine an Australia under invasion.  Them/they/xim/xey/Xie/xir/CIS-gen - Capable of holding a rifle.  Are fully vaccinated and willing to do a RAT test on arrival. Come to the army recruitment office near you. We are an inclusive and diverse military organisation. https://t.co/hHWNTQ4uMF
@itsyourxyz Probably more abt. the generational hate towards #nzpolice - one box ticked, more to go with them. The public  investigations haven't stopped until justice is served.
